description:
We provide exclusive tips and tricks of a flight attendant job interview and promote your confidence. 

Learn the basic concepts needed by all cabin crews.

  • Cabin Crews' Job Description 
  • Safety First
  • Service Mind
  • Cross Cultural Awareness
  • People Skills
  • Grooming Advice

Build your self confidence. 

Understanding all basic concepts and required information regarding a flight attendant job helps you reduce your weaknesses and prep yourself well before applying for this job. In order to accomplish in a flight attendant job interview and travel the world, you need to  learn general knowledge of this job, application procedures, beauty standard, and much more. 

Content and Overview

Through this course of 30 lectures and 2.5 hours of content, you will intensively study 11 STEPS that establish a strong sense of cabin crews assessment processes. Each chapter and content based on my personal experiences as a crew and a flight attendant coach, it is practical and adaptable to all airlines application. This tutorial was divided onto 3 major parts:

Before Take Off

This section will introduce an overall structure of this course, job description, pros and cons, and ideal personalities of cabin crews.

During Cruise

This section will provide 11 tips and tricks for your assessment day including make up and hair tutorials. 

Before Landing

This section will warm you up with several exercises, a final quiz, and free downloadable e-book. 

Students completing the course will have overall knowledge of a cabin crew job and are able to attend their assessment days with confidence. 

 Free materials and services.

Currently, this course offers these following complimentary services to all students who complete the course. 

  • FREE e-book "Coffee or Tea" 
  • FREE a feedback of your CV
  • 30 minutes consultation via Skype
  • 30% special discount for "Flight Attendant Intensive Tutoring"
title: How to be a Flight Attendant
